# Shuttle Brief
"Built into a rock by the finest goblin engineers, this vessel has all the discrete trader needs to conduct business. When you need a place to stash your goods, ask a cousin!"
# Ship Functions
"The bar, bridge and engineering areas feature shutter lockdown buttons, marked with the yellow frame. An extra button, up by the starboard docking port, closes the shutters over the docking port windows."
# GETTING THE MOST OUT OF YOUR ROCK
"As the Geode-class shuttle is built into the core of an actual asteroid, users are encouraged to make the most of the available space. Using start of the art Goblinate technology, all exterior rock is supported by a layer of deck-plating, to avoid unfortunate spacing accidents."
